questions.quote: What's the difference?! That's the one! He ripped me off! This guy ripped me off!
I mean, I admire the hell out of her. You can't have sex with someone you admire.
No I meant the bald cure. We were talking about the bald cure.
Never mind Uma, I need that ticket to get my mother's fur coat back. Why don't you just give him the money for the suit?
Well, I was excited because Jerry was putting on the puffy shirt.
Did you know Marisa Tomei won an Oscar for that? Boy, she's beautiful, don't you think? I wish I looked like that.
I mean they're your parents and you don't do anything. So why is this stranger doing it?
No see, he's not smart. People think he's smart, but he's not.
Yeah, I took her home one night – we kinda started up a little bit in the car.
… yeah …ha ha. Well you made a long journey from Milan to Minsk.
